response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but we believe it could be an unparalleled asset to you. Considering its unique features and potential impact on your endeavors, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $850,000. We understand that its true worth may vary based on your specific needs and applications, and we are confident that this investment will yield significant returns for you. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing of the product.", "product_price": 850000}
